results.content: This course is amazing.  Ehiz really shows you on how to build a really awesome portfolio.  I been using react for awhile and learned some cool things I didn't know before or haven't used.  I would definitely recommend this course to anyone who's looking to learn how to build a really cool functional and deployable portfolio.  Thanks for this course Ehiz! It's AMAZING!!!

response.content: Thank you so much for your honest review. I am glad this course helped you.
